overview:
Monica Dreger is a Digital Strategist, Blogger, and Entrepreneur.

She currently advises brands and people on social marketing. Current clients include Liz Claiborne Inc. (Juicy Couture, Kate Spade, Lucky), their cause related marketing Love Is Not Abuse/MADE and a number of start-ups (including Hoolaboola).

Over the last 12 years Monica has worked in multiple geographies and industries, covering management consulting, brand identity, communications, consumer insights and digital media. Monica has won multiple awards working at Unilever N.A. for ground-breaking digital campaigns for AXE, CARESS and DOVE. Furthermore, she has helped various pre-seed startups gain momentum in areas of marketing strategy and social media.

Monica holds an MBA and a BA in Psychology.
